messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
How big is the area a shoggoth can cover?
5 yards square
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if a shoggoth attacks more than one target?
It must divide its STR among all targets
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage penalty for a victim held within a shoggoth?
Hits are lost equal to the shoggoth's damage bonus
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can a shoggoth engulf any number of enemies?
However, they may not exceed a total SIZ greater than its own SIZ
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do victims within a shoggoth strike back?
Only on rounds in which they successfully roll STR or less on 1D100
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage type that deals full damage to a shoggoth victim?
Damage descriptive as rupturing, crushing, and being sucked into pieces.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the maximum total SIZ of enemies a shoggoth can engulf?
Its own SIZ.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Dodge percentage for a shoggoth?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of damage is halved when attacking a shoggoth?
Fire and electrical attacks.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many hit points does a shoggoth regenerate per round?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the potential outcome of the unknown code in the cells of all living things on Earth?
The code causes cells to modify, allowing a hybridized and rapid evolution never before seen in nature.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the relationship between Shoggoth Lords and their larger monstrous cousins?
Shoggoth Lords are smaller, more intelligent descendants of their larger monstrous cousins.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is unique about the evolution of Shoggoth Lords?
A handful of Shoggoths have evolved into intelligent creatures able at will to mimic humans in appearance and speech.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the potential reaction of humans to the shoggoth within them?
Will mankind welcome or revolt in horror at the shoggoth within us all?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the origin of the genetic code that could reveal a hitherto unknown code in the cells of all living things on Earth?
The origin is not specified, but it may come from some quirk of evolution, or perhaps through the unwitting intervention of some other species or being.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary effect of the code when activated?
allows a hybridized and rapid evolution never before seen in nature—with flesh instantaneously adapting to changing environments
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do Shoggoth Lords transform between their human and monstrous forms?
They can freely transmute between their human and monstrous forms
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the typical form in which Shoggoth Lords appear in humans?
grossly obese, hairless figures
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long can a Shoggoth Lord maintain its human form?
It takes great concentration and control to remain in human form for any length of time
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if a Shoggoth Lord is caught off-guard, angered, or distracted?
It quickly melts down into its terrible true gelatinous self
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is required for a shoggoth lord to remain in human form?
Great concentration and control
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if a shoggoth lord is caught off-guard, angered, or distracted?
It quickly melts down into its gelatinous self
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why do shoggoth lords find the human world appealing?
They find it delightful horror of comprehension
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary motivation of shoggoth lords?
To satisfy themselves
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do shoggoth lords deal with their territory and disputes?
They make grandiose claims of territory and engage in murderous squabbles
